Class LogAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
LogAnalyzer
public class LogAnalyzer extends Object
Read web server data and analyse hourly access patterns.
Version:
2024.03.18
Author:
Andrew Steidle

      Analyze the daily access data from the log file.

      public void analyzeHourlyData()
      Analyze the hourly access data from the log file.

    • printHourlyCounts

      public void printHourlyCounts()
      Print the hourly counts. These should have been set with a prior call to analyzeHourlyData.

    • printData

      public void printData()
      Print the lines of data read by the LogfileReader

    • numberOfAccesses

      public int numberOfAccesses()
      Read the number of times the site has been accessed
      Returns:
      int The number of times the site has been accessed

    • busiestHour

      public int busiestHour()
      Finds the busiest hour
      Returns:
      int The hour that appears the most in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • quietestHour

      public int quietestHour()
      Finds the quietest hour
      Returns:
      int The hour that appears the least in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • busiestTwoHour

      public int[] busiestTwoHour()
      Finds the busiest set of two consecutive hours
      Returns:
      int[] The range of hours that appears most in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • busiestDay

      public int busiestDay()
      Finds the busiest day
      Returns:
      int The day that appears the most in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • quietestDay

      public int quietestDay()
      Finds the quietest day
      Returns:
      int The day that appears the least in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • busiestMonth

      public int busiestMonth()
      Finds the busiest month
      Returns:
      int The month that appears the most in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • quietestMonth

      public int quietestMonth()
      Finds the quietest month
      Returns:
      int The month that appears the least in the log, ties broken by whichever came first

    • totalAccessesPerMonth

      public void totalAccessesPerMonth()
      Prints the total number of times the site was accessed each month

    • averageAccessesPerMonth

      public double[] averageAccessesPerMonth()
      Finds the total number of times the site was accessed each month
      Returns:
      double[] An array of the average number of accesses each month
